name: Wireless Bluetooth Earphones
description: Enjoy the freedom of wireless listening with these high-quality Bluetooth earphones. With crystal clear sound and a comfortable fit, these earphones are perfect for workouts, commutes, and everyday use.

name: Smartphone Tripod Stand
description: Capture steady photos and videos with ease using this adjustable smartphone tripod stand. Whether you're recording a vlog, taking a group photo, or streaming live, this tripod ensures stable shots every time.

name: Portable External Battery Charger
description: Never run out of battery again with this powerful external battery charger. With a capacity of 10,000mAh, this portable charger can fully charge your smartphone multiple times on the go.

name: Professional DSLR Camera
description: Capture stunning photos and videos with this professional DSLR camera. With advanced features and high-quality lenses, this camera is perfect for photography enthusiasts and professionals alike.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Dominate your gaming sessions with this ergonomic wireless gaming mouse. With customizable buttons, adjustable DPI settings, and ultra-fast response times, this mouse gives you the competitive edge.
duration: Up to 50 hours of battery life

name: Fitness Tracker Watch
description: Track your daily activities, monitor your heart rate, and stay connected on the go with this sleek fitness tracker watch. With a long battery life and waterproof design, it's perfect for active lifestyles.
